title: how do i know if i got my gift from riot yet?

replies.body:
Yeah my friend didn't get a notice for the skin only the icon.

I already own the Kayle skin (and many many MANY others) so how do i know if I received a mystery skin?

go to the shop, search skins for kayle. If the riot kayle skin is there then you have half the gift. Check your icons list too and you should have a party hat poro icon, the other half of the gift as well.
